This action will leave current script open in the background.
Click 'Return' button on the rightmost of the navigation bar to return to the script.

This action will NOT close the current script. If you want to close the script, please click the MDI 'Close' button on the right-top of Arcript Editor.

compose.dialogs.rawCodeCreate.placeholde.value:
Please input the raw code as aspt (yaml) format, i.e.:
!AsptTextShowCmd
 Type: 'say+'
Block: true
SpeakerName: ''
Content: 'I met an angel for the first time that summer.'
......
